comment: When Any of the Jew Haters start spewing their hatred I just mute them. But we have to admit that when they are allowed to spread their hatred shooting occur.

(m / multi-sentence

comment: Hate speech is not necessary to free speech and is not tolerated on this platform. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
